Description: External sample name
Moment when last step finished (or started)
Fraction of SNPs that are concordant between array and NGS
Mean coverage of all baits
Mean coverage of targets with coverage >= 2
Fraction bp near bait (+/- 250 bp)
Capture specificity; 1 - fraction bases that is off bait
Percentage of ALL target bases with coverage >= 2
Percentage of ALL target bases with coverage >= 10
Percentage of ALL target bases with coverage >= 20
Percentage of ALL target bases with coverage >= 30
Fraction of aligned, deduplicated, on-target bases out of the PF bases available
Total number of reads including all PF and non-PF reads
Fraction of PF unique reads that are aligned with alignment score > 0 to the reference genome

Fraction of aligned read pairs that is marked as duplicate. A read pair that is marked as duplicate is aligned to exactly the same location as another read pair that is not marked as duplicate. Two reads that align to the same location may have (some) different nucleotides.
Median of the insert sizes, where insert refers to the base pairs between the adapters.
Mean of the insert sizes, where insert refers to the base pairs between the adapters.
Standard deviation of the insert sizes, where insert refers to the base pairs between the adapters.
Number of PF reads aligned to the positive strand of the genome divided by the number of PF reads aligned to the genome
Mean read length of the set of reads examined
Number of bases in the reference genome used for alignment
Number of bases which have one or more baits on top of them
Unique number of target bases in the experiment where target is usually exons etc
Name of the bait set used in the hybrid selection
Number of bases in the PF aligned reads that are aligned to the reference genome. Accounts for clipping and gaps (=indels?)
